amendment_span_text:
(a) 	"Specified Entity" means in relation to Party A for the purpose of:
Section 5(a)(v): None Section 5(a)(vi): None Section 5(a)(vii): None Section 5(b)(ii): None
and in relation to Party B for the purpose of:
Section 5(a)(v): None Section 5(a)(vi): None Section 5(a)(vii): Party B, Mediabistro.com, Ellen L. Meckler and Alan M. Meckler Section 5(b)(ii): None
change_explanation: This amendment replaces the definition of 'Specified Entity' for both Party A and Party B, specifying which entities are included for various sections. For Party B, it now includes additional named individuals and entities for Section 5(a)(vii).
target_paragraph_explanation: Lines 20-21 contain the definition of 'Specified Entity' for both Party A and Party B, matching the description of Part 1(a) in the Schedule.

amendment_span_text:
(i) Additional Termination Event: For the purpose of Section 5(b)(iii) of this Agreement, it shall be an "Additional Termination Event" with Party B being the Affected Party if:
(i) any Credit Support Document, in accordance with its terms, expires, terminates, or ceases to be in full force and effect for the purpose of this Agreement unless (i) this Agreement is expressly amended in writing to reflect that it is no longer a Credit Support Document hereunder or (ii) a replacement Credit Support Document is entered into the terms of which are satisfactory to Party A in its sole discretion; or
(ii) on any date (assuming, for the purpose of such calculation, that such date is an Early Termination Date), the amount payable by Party B pursuant to Section 6(e) of the Master Agreement would be zero.
change_explanation: This amendment replaces the entirety of Part 1(g) to define new Additional Termination Events, including failure of Credit Support Documents or a zero payment calculation for Party B.
target_paragraph_explanation: Lines 37-45 are labeled as (g) and define 'Additional Termination Event,' matching the description for Part 1(g) of the Schedule.

amendment_span_text: (b) Quarterly and annual financial statements of Party B when reasonably requested by Party A and not otherwise provided to Party A under the Credit Support Documents.
change_explanation: This amendment replaces Part 2(b) to require Party B to provide quarterly and annual financial statements to Party A upon reasonable request, unless already provided under Credit Support Documents.
target_paragraph_explanation: Lines 76-78 specify Party B's obligation to provide annual and quarterly financial statements, which aligns with the requirements for Part 2(b) of the Schedule.

change_explanation: This amendment replaces Part 4(f) to comprehensively define which documents are considered Credit Support Documents for Party B, listing specific agreements and allowing for additional documents entered into after February 23, 2009.
target_paragraph_explanation: Line 107 is labeled as (f) and defines 'Credit Support Document' for Party B, matching the description for Part 4(f) of the Schedule.

amendment_span_text: (d) Credit Support Provider. In relation to Party A, means not applicable. In relation to Party B, means each party to any Credit Support Document of Party B, other than (i) Party A or Party B, (ii) any Affiliate of Party A, or (iii) any other secured party under such Credit Support Document.
change_explanation: This amendment replaces Part 4(g) to redefine 'Credit Support Provider' for Party B, specifying exclusions for Party A, Party B, any Affiliate of Party A, or any other secured party.
target_paragraph_explanation: Line 108 is labeled as (g) and defines 'Credit Support Provider' for Party B, matching the description for Part 4(g) of the Schedule.

amendment_span_text:
The 2007 Confirmation is hereby amended to delete the "Other Terms and Conditions" provision therefrom and to insert in place thereof the following:
Other Term and Conditions:
Party B agrees to deposit into a deposit account with Party A (the "Blocked Account"), commencing February 23, 2009, and continuing on each April 1, July 1, October 1, and January 1 thereafter, cash in amount equal to the Fixed Amount that would be payable for the current Calculation Period. Party B hereby grants to Party A a security interest in and an assignment of the Blocked Account, and pledges and assigns the Blocked Account to Party A, to secure the prompt and full payment and performance of the obligations of Party B hereunder. Party B hereby irrevocably authorizes Party A, at any time and from time to time, to cause any and all of the funds, credits and balances in the Blocked Account, to be applied to the payments due hereunder. Party A agrees to pay interest at a rate per annum equal to the overnight Federal Funds Rate for the funds deposited in the Blocked Account.
target_section: Other Terms and Conditions of the 2007 Confirmation
change_explanation: This amendment deletes the existing 'Other Terms and Conditions' in the 2007 Confirmation and replaces it with a new provision requiring Party B to deposit cash into a Blocked Account, grants Party A a security interest in the account, and sets the interest rate for funds deposited.
target_paragraph_explanation: There is no section in the provided contract text labeled as 'Other Terms and Conditions of the 2007 Confirmation,' nor is there any text that matches the described amendment. It appears this content is not present in the provided contract.
